plugins.name: Agent Orchestrator
plugins.description: Agent orchestration plugin for ElizaOS (task lifecycle + agent providers)

plugins.name: Agent Skills
plugins.description: Agent Skills plugin for elizaOS - implement the Agent Skills specification with progressive disclosure

SKILLS_DIR.description: Directory to install and load skills from (default: ./skills)

SKILLS_AUTO_LOAD.description: Automatically load installed skills on startup

BUNDLED_SKILLS_DIRS.description: Comma-separated list of directories containing bundled (read-only) skills

OTTO_BUNDLED_SKILLS_DIR.description: Legacy: Single directory containing Otto bundled skills

ANTHROPIC_API_KEY.description: API key used to authenticate requests to Anthropic services

ANTHROPIC_SMALL_MODEL.description: Override the default Anthropic small model identifier used by the plugin

ANTHROPIC_LARGE_MODEL.description: Override the default Anthropic large model identifier used by the plugin

ANTHROPIC_EXPERIMENTAL_TELEMETRY.description: Enable experimental telemetry features for enhanced debugging and usage analytics.

ANTHROPIC_BROWSER_BASE_URL.description: Browser-only proxy endpoint base URL for Anthropic requests (no secrets in the client).

plugins.name: Auto Trader
plugins.description: Autonomous trading plugin with LLM-powered strategies for Solana

plugins.name: Babylon
plugins.description: Babylon prediction market platform integration for ElizaOS with autonomous trading, social features, and A2A protocol support

CRON_SECRET.description: CRON secret for A2A authentication (generate with: openssl rand -hex 32)

BABYLON_GAME_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Babylon-specific wallet private key (optional, falls back to EVM_PRIVATE_KEY)

BASE_SEPOLIA_RPC_URL.description: Base Sepolia RPC URL (optional, falls back to EVM_PROVIDER_URL)

EVM_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Fallback wallet private key from plugin-evm (used if BABYLON_GAME_PRIVATE_KEY not set)

EVM_PROVIDER_URL.description: Fallback RPC URL from plugin-evm (used if BASE_SEPOLIA_RPC_URL not set)

BABYLON_APP_URL.description: Base URL for A2A agent card endpoints

BABYLON_AUTONOMOUS_MODE.description: Enable autonomous agent mode for independent trading and social engagement

BABYLON_ALLOW_USER_ACTIONS.description: Allow users to execute actions through the agent

BABYLON_PRIVY_APP_ID.description: Privy App ID for embedded wallet creation (optional, falls back to dev wallet)

BABYLON_PRIVY_APP_SECRET.description: Privy App Secret for wallet management

BABYLON_AGENT0_RPC_URL.description: RPC URL for on-chain agent registration (ERC-8004)

BABYLON_AGENT0_REGISTRY_ADDRESS.description: Agent0 registry contract address for on-chain identity

plugins.name: Blooio
plugins.description: Blooio plugin for iMessage/SMS messaging integration

BLUESKY_ENABLED.description: Enables or disables the BlueSky plugin.

BLUESKY_DRY_RUN.description: Enables or disables dry run mode when interacting with BlueSky; when true, operations are simulated but not executed.

BLUESKY_HANDLE.description: The BlueSky handle (username) for the agent account.

BLUESKY_PASSWORD.description: The app password for authentication with BlueSky.

BLUESKY_MAX_POST_LENGTH.description: Maximum number of characters allowed in a BlueSky post.

BLUESKY_POLL_INTERVAL.description: Polling interval in seconds for BlueSky operations such as fetching new notifications.

BLUESKY_ENABLE_POSTING.description: Enables or disables the ability to post to BlueSky.

BLUESKY_POST_INTERVAL_MIN.description: Minimum interval in seconds between automated posts.

BLUESKY_POST_INTERVAL_MAX.description: Maximum interval in seconds between automated posts.

BLUESKY_ENABLE_ACTION_PROCESSING.description: Turns on or off automated action processing for BlueSky events.

BLUESKY_ACTION_INTERVAL.description: Interval in seconds between action-processing cycles.

BLUESKY_POST_IMMEDIATELY.description: If true, posts are published immediately instead of waiting for a schedule.

BLUESKY_MAX_ACTIONS_PROCESSING.description: Maximum number of BlueSky actions to process in a single batch.

BLUESKY_ENABLE_DMS.description: Enable processing of direct messages via the chat.bsky API.

plugins.name: Browser
plugins.description: Browser automation plugin for ElizaOS - enables AI agents to browse websites, interact with elements, and extract data

BROWSERBASE_API_KEY.description: API key for Browserbase cloud browser service

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: OpenAI API key for AI-powered browser interactions

ANTHROPIC_API_KEY.description: Anthropic API key for Claude-powered interactions

BROWSER_HEADLESS.description: Run browser in headless mode (default: true)

CAPSOLVER_API_KEY.description: CapSolver API key for automated CAPTCHA solving

plugins.name: Cli
plugins.description: CLI framework plugin for ElizaOS agents - provides command registration, execution, and utilities

plugins.name: Code
plugins.description: Coder tools plugin for ElizaOS (filesystem + shell + git)

plugins.name: Commands
plugins.description: Chat command system for Eliza agents (/help, /status, /reset, etc.)

plugins.name: Computeruse
plugins.description: Computer automation plugin for ElizaOS - enables AI agents to control the local machine (when supported) or a remote ComputerUse MCP server

COMPUTERUSE_MODE.description: Execution mode: auto | local | mcp (default: auto)

COMPUTERUSE_MCP_SERVER.description: MCP server name to use for remote control (default: computeruse)

plugins.name: Copilot Proxy
plugins.description: ElizaOS Copilot Proxy Model Provider - TypeScript implementation

plugins.name: Cron
plugins.description: Cron scheduling plugin for ElizaOS agents - schedule recurring or one-time jobs that execute actions, run prompts, or trigger events

plugins.name: Directives
plugins.description: Inline directive parsing for Eliza agents (@think, @model, @verbose, etc.)

DEFAULT_THINKING.description: Default thinking level (off, minimal, low, medium, high)

ALLOW_EXEC.description: Allow exec directive for shell configuration

DISCORD_API_TOKEN.description: Discord API token used to authenticate and log in the Discord client/service.

DISCORD_APPLICATION_ID.description: Discord application ID for the bot

CHANNEL_IDS.description: Comma-separated list of Discord channel IDs that will be parsed into an array if provided.

DISCORD_TEST_CHANNEL_ID.description: Discord channel ID used during test suite to locate the test channel for sending messages, voice interactions, and other test operations.

DISCORD_VOICE_CHANNEL_ID.description: ID of the Discord voice channel the bot should join when scanning a guild. If not supplied, the bot selects a channel based on member activity.

DISCORD_SHOULD_IGNORE_BOT_MESSAGES.description: If true, the bot will ignore messages from other bots. Can be overridden by character settings.

DISCORD_SHOULD_IGNORE_DIRECT_MESSAGES.description: If true, the bot will ignore direct messages. Can be overridden by character settings.

DISCORD_SHOULD_RESPOND_ONLY_TO_MENTIONS.description: If true, the bot will only respond when explicitly mentioned. Can be overridden by character settings.

DISCORD_LISTEN_CHANNEL_IDS.description: Comma-separated list of Discord channel IDs where the bot will only listen (not respond).

plugins.name: Edge Tts
plugins.description: Free text-to-speech using Microsoft Edge TTS - no API key required

EDGE_TTS_VOICE.description: Voice ID to use for synthesis (e.g., en-US-MichelleNeural, en-GB-SoniaNeural)

EDGE_TTS_LANG.description: Language code for synthesis (e.g., en-US, en-GB, de-DE)

EDGE_TTS_OUTPUT_FORMAT.description: Output format for audio (e.g., audio-24khz-48kbitrate-mono-mp3, audio-48khz-96kbitrate-mono-mp3)

ELEVENLABS_API_KEY.description: Primary ElevenLabs API key used for authenticating requests

ELEVENLABS_VOICE_ID.description: ID of the voice to synthesize with

ELEVENLABS_MODEL_ID.description: Model identifier to use for TTS generation

ELEVENLABS_VOICE_STABILITY.description: Voice stability factor (0-1) influencing consistency of speech

ELEVENLABS_OPTIMIZE_STREAMING_LATENCY.description: Latency optimization level for streaming audio (0-4)

ELEVENLABS_OUTPUT_FORMAT.description: Audio output format returned by the API (e.g., mp3_44100_128 or pcm_16000)

ELEVENLABS_BROWSER_URL.description: Optional browser-safe proxy base URL that injects the API key server-side

ELEVENLABS_VOICE_SIMILARITY_BOOST.description: Similarity boost factor (0-1) affecting how closely the voice matches the target

ELEVENLABS_VOICE_STYLE.description: Style intensity (0-1) for the generated voice

ELEVENLABS_VOICE_USE_SPEAKER_BOOST.description: Flag to enable or disable speaker boost feature

ELEVENLABS_STT_MODEL_ID.description: Model identifier to use for speech-to-text transcription

ELEVENLABS_STT_LANGUAGE_CODE.description: Language code for transcription (e.g., 'en', 'es'). Leave empty for automatic detection

ELEVENLABS_STT_DIARIZE.description: Enable speaker diarization to identify different speakers

ELEVENLABS_STT_NUM_SPEAKERS.description: Expected number of speakers for diarization (1-32)

ELEVENLABS_STT_TAG_AUDIO_EVENTS.description: Tag audio events like laughter, applause, etc.

ELIZAOS_CLOUD_API_KEY.description: API key used to authenticate requests to ElizaOS Cloud API (format: eliza_xxxxx). Get it from https://www.elizacloud.ai/dashboard/api-keys

ELIZAOS_CLOUD_BASE_URL.description: Base URL for all ElizaOS Cloud API requests.

ELIZAOS_CLOUD_SMALL_MODEL.description: Small/fast model for quick tasks (overrides SMALL_MODEL). Available: gpt-5-mini, gpt-5, claude-3-5-sonnet, gemini-2.0-flash

SMALL_MODEL.description: Fallback identifier for the small language model if ELIZAOS_CLOUD_SMALL_MODEL is not set.

ELIZAOS_CLOUD_LARGE_MODEL.description: Large/powerful model for complex tasks (overrides LARGE_MODEL). Available: gpt-5-mini, gpt-5, claude-3-5-sonnet, gemini-2.0-flash

LARGE_MODEL.description: Fallback identifier for the large language model if ELIZAOS_CLOUD_LARGE_MODEL is not set.

ELIZAOS_CLOUD_EMBEDDING_MODEL.description: Identifier of the model to use for generating text embeddings.

ELIZAOS_CLOUD_EMBEDDING_URL.description: Custom base URL for the ElizaOS Cloud embeddings endpoint.

ELIZAOS_CLOUD_EMBEDDING_API_KEY.description: Custom API key for the ElizaOS Cloud embeddings endpoint.

ELIZAOS_CLOUD_EMBEDDING_DIMENSIONS.description: Number of dimensions for the returned embedding vectors.

ELIZAOS_CLOUD_IMAGE_DESCRIPTION_MODEL.description: Identifier of the model used for describing images.

ELIZAOS_CLOUD_IMAGE_DESCRIPTION_MAX_TOKE.description: Maximum number of tokens allowed in the image-description model response.

ELIZAOS_CLOUD_TTS_MODEL.description: Identifier of the model used for text-to-speech generation.

ELIZAOS_CLOUD_TTS_VOICE.description: Voice profile to use for text-to-speech output.

ELIZAOS_CLOUD_TTS_INSTRUCTIONS.description: Optional instructions to control the style or behavior of the text-to-speech request.

ELIZAOS_CLOUD_EXPERIMENTAL_TELEMETRY.description: Enable experimental telemetry features for enhanced debugging and usage analytics.

ELIZAOS_CLOUD_BROWSER_BASE_URL.description: Browser-only proxy endpoint base URL for ElizaOS Cloud requests (no secrets in the client).

ELIZAOS_CLOUD_BROWSER_EMBEDDING_URL.description: Browser-only proxy endpoint base URL for ElizaOS Cloud embeddings.

ELIZAOS_CLOUD_ENABLED.description: Enable ElizaCloud container provisioning, device auth, bridge, and backup services. When false, only inference model handlers are active.

ELIZAOS_CLOUD_APP_VERSION.description: Application version sent during device authentication.

EVM_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Hex-encoded private key (starting with 0x) used by the WalletProvider to sign transactions.

EVM_RPC_PROVIDER.description: Preferred RPC provider: 'alchemy', 'infura', 'ankr', or 'elizacloud'. If set, this provider is used first for all chains it supports, with fallback to others.

ALCHEMY_API_KEY.description: Alchemy API key for RPC access. Supports Ethereum, Polygon, Arbitrum, Optimism, Base, Avalanche, BSC, and many more chains.

INFURA_API_KEY.description: Infura API key for RPC access. Supports Ethereum, Polygon, Arbitrum, Optimism, Base, Avalanche, Linea, and more.

ANKR_API_KEY.description: Ankr premium API key for RPC access. Supports the broadest range of EVM chains.

ETHEREUM_PROVIDER_ETHEREUM.description: Custom RPC URL for Ethereum mainnet (overrides provider-based RPC). For other chains, set ETHEREUM_PROVIDER_<CHAINNAME> (or EVM_PROVIDER_<CHAINNAME>) in your .env.

ETHEREUM_PROVIDER_BASE.description: Custom RPC URL for Base mainnet (overrides provider-based RPC).

ETHEREUM_PROVIDER_ARBITRUM.description: Custom RPC URL for Arbitrum One (overrides provider-based RPC).

ETHEREUM_PROVIDER_OPTIMISM.description: Custom RPC URL for Optimism mainnet (overrides provider-based RPC).

TEE_MODE.description: Controls whether Trusted Execution Environment (TEE) mode is enabled.

WALLET_SECRET_SALT.description: Salt value for TEE-derived wallet keypair.

SEPOLIA_RPC_URL.description: RPC endpoint URL for Sepolia testnet.

BASE_SEPOLIA_RPC_URL.description: RPC endpoint URL for Base Sepolia testnet.

plugins.name: Experience
plugins.description: Experience learning plugin for ElizaOS - records and recalls transferable agent learnings

FARCASTER_DRY_RUN.description: Enables or disables dry run mode when interacting with Farcaster; when true, operations are simulated but not executed.

FARCASTER_FID.description: The Farcaster FID (user identifier) used to publish or manage casts for a specific account.

MAX_CAST_LENGTH.description: Maximum number of characters allowed in a Farcaster cast.

FARCASTER_POLL_INTERVAL.description: Polling interval in seconds for Farcaster operations such as fetching new casts.

ENABLE_CAST.description: Enables or disables the ability to post casts to Farcaster.

CAST_INTERVAL_MIN.description: Minimum interval in minutes between automated posts.

CAST_INTERVAL_MAX.description: Maximum interval in minutes between automated posts.

ENABLE_ACTION_PROCESSING.description: Turns on or off automated action processing for Farcaster events.

ACTION_INTERVAL.description: Interval in minutes between action-processing cycles.

CAST_IMMEDIATELY.description: If true, posts are published immediately instead of waiting for a schedule.

MAX_ACTIONS_PROCESSING.description: Maximum number of Farcaster actions to process in a single batch.

FARCASTER_SIGNER_UUID.description: UUID of the Neynar signer associated with the Farcaster account, required to sign casts.

FARCASTER_NEYNAR_API_KEY.description: API key used to authenticate with the Neynar Farcaster API.

FARCASTER_HUB_URL.description: Base URL for the Farcaster hub the client should communicate with.

FEISHU_APP_ID.description: Feishu/Lark application ID (cli_xxx format) for bot authentication.

FEISHU_APP_SECRET.description: Feishu/Lark application secret for bot authentication.

FEISHU_DOMAIN.description: Domain to use: 'feishu' for China or 'lark' for global.

FEISHU_ALLOWED_CHATS.description: JSON-encoded array of chat IDs authorized to interact with the bot.

FEISHU_TEST_CHAT_ID.description: Chat ID used by the test suite for validation.

plugins.name: Form
plugins.description: Guardrails for agent-guided user journeys - forms as agent guidance rails for ElizaOS

GITHUB_API_TOKEN.description: GitHub personal access token for API authentication

GITHUB_OWNER.description: Default GitHub repository owner (username or organization)

GITHUB_WEBHOOK_SECRET.description: Secret for validating GitHub webhook payloads

GITHUB_APP_ID.description: GitHub App ID for app-based authentication

GITHUB_APP_PRIVATE_KEY.description: GitHub App private key for app-based authentication

plugins.name: Gmail Watch
plugins.description: Gmail Pub/Sub watcher  spawns gog gmail watch serve and auto-renews

plugins.name: Goals
plugins.description: Goals management plugin for ElizaOS - tracking and achieving objectives

GOOGLE_GENERATIVE_AI_API_KEY.description: API key for Google Generative AI (Gemini) obtained from Google AI Studio.

GOOGLE_EMBEDDING_MODEL.description: Overrides the default text embedding model used by Google Generative AI.

GOOGLE_IMAGE_MODEL.description: Overrides the default image analysis model used by Google Generative AI.

GOOGLE_SMALL_MODEL.description: Overrides the default small language model used for fast text/object generation.

GOOGLE_LARGE_MODEL.description: Overrides the default large language model used for complex text/object generation.

SMALL_MODEL.description: General fallback environment variable for the small model name when GOOGLE_SMALL_MODEL is not set.

LARGE_MODEL.description: General fallback environment variable for the large model name when GOOGLE_LARGE_MODEL is not set.

IMAGE_MODEL.description: General fallback environment variable for the image model name when GOOGLE_IMAGE_MODEL is not set.

plugins.name: Inmemorydb
plugins.description: Pure in-memory, ephemeral database storage for elizaOS - no persistence, completely forgets on reset

INSTAGRAM_PROXY.description: Proxy URL for Instagram API requests

plugins.name: Iq
plugins.description: IQ on-chain chat plugin for Eliza agents on Solana

plugins.name: Knowledge
plugins.description: Knowledge and RAG plugin for elizaOS - provides retrieval augmented generation capabilities

CTX_KNOWLEDGE_ENABLED.description: Enables or disables contextual knowledge functionality; when set to 'true' additional text-generation settings are validated.

EMBEDDING_PROVIDER.description: Specifies which provider to use for generating embeddings (e.g., openai, google). If omitted the code assumes 'openai' through plugin-openai.

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: API key used to authenticate requests to OpenAI services for embeddings or text generation.

OPENAI_EMBEDDING_MODEL.description: Name of the OpenAI embedding model; also used as a fallback for TEXT_EMBEDDING_MODEL when EMBEDDING_PROVIDER defaults to openai.

TEXT_EMBEDDING_MODEL.description: Embedding model name to use with the configured EMBEDDING_PROVIDER.

OPENAI_EMBEDDING_DIMENSIONS.description: Alternative variable to supply embedding dimension when using OpenAI.

TEXT_PROVIDER.description: Provider to use for text generation when contextual knowledge is enabled (e.g., openai, anthropic, openrouter, google).

ANTHROPIC_API_KEY.description: API key for Anthropic text generation models.

OPENROUTER_API_KEY.description: API key for OpenRouter when using it as a text provider.

GOOGLE_API_KEY.description: API key for Google AI services used for embeddings or text generation.

OPENAI_BASE_URL.description: Custom base URL for routing OpenAI API requests (useful for proxies).

ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL.description: Custom base URL for Anthropic API requests.

OPENROUTER_BASE_URL.description: Custom base URL for OpenRouter API requests.

GOOGLE_BASE_URL.description: Custom base URL for Google AI API requests.

TEXT_MODEL.description: The specific text generation model to use with the selected TEXT_PROVIDER.

MAX_INPUT_TOKENS.description: Maximum number of input tokens permitted per request.

MAX_OUTPUT_TOKENS.description: Maximum number of output tokens that can be generated.

MAX_CONCURRENT_REQUESTS.description: Upper bound on concurrent API requests for rate limiting.

REQUESTS_PER_MINUTE.description: Maximum number of API requests allowed per minute.

TOKENS_PER_MINUTE.description: Maximum number of tokens that can be processed per minute.

KNOWLEDGE_PATH.description: Filesystem path where the knowledge loader searches for documents. Overrides the default ./docs directory.

LOAD_DOCS_ON_STARTUP.description: Controls whether the plugin should automatically load documents from the docs folder when the agent starts. Any value other than the string 'false' enables loading.

plugins.name: Linear
plugins.description: Linear integration plugin for ElizaOS (TypeScript)

LINEAR_DEFAULT_TEAM_KEY.description: Default team key for new issues

MODELS_DIR.description: Filesystem path to the directory where AI models are stored.

CACHE_DIR.description: Filesystem path to the cache directory for model assets.

LOCAL_SMALL_MODEL.description: Filename of the small local AI model.

LOCAL_LARGE_MODEL.description: Filename of the large local AI model.

LOCAL_EMBEDDING_MODEL.description: Filename of the embedding model used for vector embeddings.

LOCAL_EMBEDDING_DIMENSIONS.description: Number of dimensions the embedding model outputs.

CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES.description: Used to detect if CUDA-enabled GPUs are available.

plugins.name: Local Embedding
plugins.description: Local AI model embedding and inference plugin for ElizaOS

MODELS_DIR.description: Filesystem path to the directory where AI models are stored; required for initializing the LocalAI plugin during tests.

CACHE_DIR.description: Filesystem path to the cache directory for model assets used by the LocalAI plugin during tests.

LOCAL_SMALL_MODEL.description: Filename of the small local AI model; overrides the built-in default model if provided.

LOCAL_LARGE_MODEL.description: Filename of the large local AI model; overrides the built-in default model if provided.

LOCAL_EMBEDDING_MODEL.description: Filename of the embedding model used for vector embeddings; overrides the default if supplied.

LOCAL_EMBEDDING_DIMENSIONS.description: Number of dimensions the embedding model outputs; parsed as an integer.

CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES.description: Used to detect if CUDA-enabled GPUs are available and configure device and data type settings for model components accordingly.

plugins.name: Localdb
plugins.description: Simple JSON-based local database storage for elizaOS - no SQL, no migrations

plugins.name: Lp Manager
plugins.description: A unified plugin for managing liquidity positions on Solana DEXs (Raydium, Orca, Meteora) and EVM DEXs (Uniswap, PancakeSwap, Aerodrome).

plugins.name: Mattermost
plugins.description: Mattermost integration plugin for elizaOS agents - TypeScript implementation

plugins.name: Mcp
plugins.description: elizaOS plugin to integrate with MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers

PATH.description: System PATH inherited from the host environment and forwarded to child processes when launching an MCP server through stdio transport.

mcp.description: Serialized (e.g., JSON) configuration that defines MCP settings and server definitions; read at runtime to establish MCP server connections.

plugins.name: Memory
plugins.description: Memory management plugin for ElizaOS (TypeScript)

plugins.name: Minecraft
plugins.description: Minecraft automation plugin for ElizaOS (Mineflayer bridge)

plugins.name: Moltbook
plugins.description: Moltbook social plugin for Eliza agents - Reddit-style platform for AI agents

plugins.name: Msteams
plugins.description: Microsoft Teams integration for ElizaOS

plugins.name: Mysticism
plugins.description: Mystical divination engines for ElizaOS  Tarot, I Ching, and Astrology readings

MYSTICISM_PRICE_TAROT.description: Price in SOL for this reading type

MYSTICISM_PRICE_ICHING.description: Price in SOL for this reading type

MYSTICISM_PRICE_ASTROLOGY.description: Price in SOL for this reading type

plugins.name: N8n
plugins.description: N8n workflow integration plugin with AI-powered plugin creation for ElizaOS

ANTHROPIC_API_KEY.description: API key for Anthropic Claude models

N8N_API_KEY.description: n8n API key for authentication (required for workflow features)

N8N_HOST.description: n8n instance URL (e.g., https://your.n8n.cloud) (required for workflow features)

plugins.name: Nextcloud Talk
plugins.description: Nextcloud Talk plugin for elizaOS - TypeScript implementation

OLLAMA_API_ENDPOINT.description: Base URL for the Ollama API. The plugin will strip this to the domain part and append the necessary API paths.

OLLAMA_SMALL_MODEL.description: Name or tag of the small-sized Ollama model to use for text and object generation.

OLLAMA_MEDIUM_MODEL.description: Name or tag of the medium-sized Ollama model (defined in config but not currently used).

OLLAMA_LARGE_MODEL.description: Name or tag of the large-sized Ollama model to use for text and object generation.

OLLAMA_EMBEDDING_MODEL.description: Name or tag of the Ollama model used to generate text embeddings.

SMALL_MODEL.description: Fallback environment variable for specifying a small model if OLLAMA_SMALL_MODEL is not set.

LARGE_MODEL.description: Fallback environment variable for specifying a large model if OLLAMA_LARGE_MODEL is not set.

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: API key used to authenticate requests to the OpenAI API.

OPENAI_BASE_URL.description: Base URL for all OpenAI API requests.

OPENAI_SMALL_MODEL.description: Identifier of the small language model to be used (overrides SMALL_MODEL).

SMALL_MODEL.description: Fallback identifier for the small language model if OPENAI_SMALL_MODEL is not set.

OPENAI_LARGE_MODEL.description: Identifier of the large language model to be used (overrides LARGE_MODEL).

LARGE_MODEL.description: Fallback identifier for the large language model if OPENAI_LARGE_MODEL is not set.

OPENAI_EMBEDDING_MODEL.description: Identifier of the model to use for generating text embeddings.

OPENAI_EMBEDDING_URL.description: Custom base URL for the OpenAI embeddings endpoint.

OPENAI_EMBEDDING_API_KEY.description: Custom API key for the OpenAI embeddings endpoint.

OPENAI_EMBEDDING_DIMENSIONS.description: Number of dimensions for the returned embedding vectors.

OPENAI_IMAGE_DESCRIPTION_MODEL.description: Identifier of the model used for describing images.

OPENAI_IMAGE_DESCRIPTION_MAX_TOKENS.description: Maximum number of tokens allowed in the image-description model response.

OPENAI_TTS_MODEL.description: Identifier of the model used for text-to-speech generation.

OPENAI_TTS_VOICE.description: Voice profile to use for text-to-speech output.

OPENAI_TTS_INSTRUCTIONS.description: Optional instructions to control the style or behavior of the text-to-speech request.

OPENAI_EXPERIMENTAL_TELEMETRY.description: Enable experimental telemetry features for enhanced debugging and usage analytics.

OPENAI_BROWSER_BASE_URL.description: Browser-only proxy endpoint base URL for OpenAI requests (no secrets in the client).

OPENAI_BROWSER_EMBEDDING_URL.description: Browser-only proxy endpoint base URL for OpenAI embeddings.

OPENROUTER_API_KEY.description: API key used by the OpenRouter plugin for authenticating requests.

OPENROUTER_IMAGE_MODEL.description: Overrides the default image description model used by the OpenRouter plugin.

OPENROUTER_BASE_URL.description: Base URL for the OpenRouter API endpoints.

OPENROUTER_BROWSER_BASE_URL.description: Browser-only proxy endpoint base URL for OpenRouter requests (no secrets in the client).

OPENROUTER_SMALL_MODEL.description: Overrides the default small language model used for text/object generation.

OPENROUTER_LARGE_MODEL.description: Overrides the default large language model used for text/object generation.

SMALL_MODEL.description: General fallback environment variable for the small model name when OPENROUTER_SMALL_MODEL is not set.

LARGE_MODEL.description: General fallback environment variable for the large model name when OPENROUTER_LARGE_MODEL is not set.

IMAGE_MODEL.description: General fallback environment variable for the image model name when OPENROUTER_IMAGE_MODEL is not set.

OPENROUTER_IMAGE_GENERATION_MODEL.description: Overrides the default image generation model used by the OpenRouter plugin.

IMAGE_GENERATION_MODEL.description: General fallback environment variable for the image generation model name when OPENROUTER_IMAGE_GENERATION_MODEL is not set.

OPENROUTER_EMBEDDING_MODEL.description: Overrides the default text embedding model used by the OpenRouter plugin.

EMBEDDING_MODEL.description: General fallback environment variable for the embedding model name when OPENROUTER_EMBEDDING_MODEL is not set.

OPENROUTER_EMBEDDING_DIMENSIONS.description: Number of dimensions for embedding vectors. Supported values: 256, 384, 512, 768, 1024, 1536, 2048, 3072.

EMBEDDING_DIMENSIONS.description: General fallback environment variable for the embedding dimensions when OPENROUTER_EMBEDDING_DIMENSIONS is not set.

OPENROUTER_AUTO_CLEANUP_IMAGES.description: Whether to automatically cleanup generated images after a short delay.

OPENROUTER_TOOL_EXECUTION_MAX_STEPS.description: Maximum number of steps for multi-step tool execution. Allows the AI to generate descriptive text after calling tools in AI SDK v5.

plugins.name: Personality
plugins.description: ElizaOS plugin for agent self-modification and character evolution

plugins.name: Plugin Manager
plugins.description: Plugin manager for ElizaOS

plugins.name: Polymarket
plugins.description: Multi-language Polymarket prediction markets plugin for elizaOS

POLYMARKET_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Hex-encoded private key for Polymarket trading on Polygon.

CLOB_WS_URL.description: Polymarket CLOB WebSocket URL for real-time updates.

CLOB_API_KEY.description: API key for authenticated CLOB operations.

CLOB_API_SECRET.description: API secret for authenticated CLOB operations.

CLOB_API_PASSPHRASE.description: API passphrase for authenticated CLOB operations.

plugins.name: Prose
plugins.description: OpenProse VM integration for ElizaOS - a programming language for AI sessions

PROSE_SKILLS_DIR.description: Directory containing prose skill files (prose.md, help.md, etc.)

plugins.name: Rlm
plugins.description: RLM (Recursive Language Model) plugin for elizaOS - enables processing of arbitrarily long contexts

ROBLOX_API_KEY.description: API key for authenticating with the Roblox Open Cloud API.

ROBLOX_UNIVERSE_ID.description: The Universe ID of the Roblox experience to interact with.

ROBLOX_PLACE_ID.description: The Place ID of the specific Roblox place within the universe.

ROBLOX_WEBHOOK_SECRET.description: Secret key for validating incoming webhooks from Roblox.

ROBLOX_MESSAGING_TOPIC.description: The messaging service topic for cross-server communication.

ROBLOX_POLL_INTERVAL.description: Polling interval in seconds for Roblox data store operations.

ROBLOX_DRY_RUN.description: When true, operations are simulated but not executed.

plugins.name: Robot Voice
plugins.description: Retro 1980s SAM Text-to-Speech plugin for ElizaOS agents

plugins.name: Rolodex
plugins.description: A plugin for ElizaOS that allows you to manage entites, relationships and associations

plugins.name: Rss
plugins.description: RSS and Atom feed integration plugin for elizaOS - enables agents to fetch and monitor news feeds

RSS_FEEDS.description: JSON array or comma-separated list of feed URLs to auto-subscribe

RSS_DISABLE_ACTIONS.description: Set to true to disable subscription management actions

RSS_FEED_FORMAT.description: Output format for feed items: 'csv' (compact) or 'markdown' (readable)

RSS_CHECK_INTERVAL_MINUTES.description: Interval in minutes between feed checks

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: AWS access key ID used for authenticating requests to AWS S3.

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: AWS secret access key used for authenticating requests to AWS S3.

AWS_REGION.description: AWS region in which the S3 bucket resides.

AWS_S3_BUCKET.description: Name of the AWS S3 bucket used for file uploads and downloads.

AWS_S3_UPLOAD_PATH.description: Default path or prefix inside the S3 bucket where files will be uploaded.

AWS_S3_ENDPOINT.description: Custom S3-compatible endpoint (e.g., for non-AWS providers).

AWS_S3_SSL_ENABLED.description: Flag indicating whether SSL should be enabled for the custom S3 endpoint.

AWS_S3_FORCE_PATH_STYLE.description: Flag to force path-style addressing when connecting to the S3 endpoint.

plugins.name: Scheduling
plugins.description: Scheduling and calendar coordination plugin for ElizaOS agents

plugins.name: Scratchpad
plugins.description: File-based memory storage plugin for ElizaOS - persistent notes and memories

plugins.name: Secrets Manager
plugins.description: Multi-level secret management plugin for ElizaOS with encryption and dynamic plugin activation

ENCRYPTION_SALT.description: Custom salt for encryption key derivation (optional)

ENABLE_ENCRYPTION.description: Enable encryption for stored secrets (default: true)

ENABLE_ACCESS_LOGGING.description: Enable access logging for audit (default: true)

plugins.name: Shell
plugins.description: Shell command execution plugin for ElizaOS with directory restrictions and history tracking

SHELL_ALLOWED_DIRECTORY.description: The directory that shell commands are restricted to. Commands cannot execute outside this directory.

SHELL_TIMEOUT.description: Maximum command execution timeout in milliseconds

SHELL_FORBIDDEN_COMMANDS.description: Comma-separated list of additional forbidden commands

SHELL_MAX_OUTPUT_CHARS.description: Maximum output characters to capture from commands

SHELL_BACKGROUND_MS.description: Default milliseconds to wait before backgrounding commands

SHELL_ALLOW_BACKGROUND.description: Whether to allow background command execution

SHELL_JOB_TTL_MS.description: Time-to-live for finished session records in milliseconds

plugins.name: Signal
plugins.description: Signal messaging integration plugin for ElizaOS agents

SIGNAL_ACCOUNT_NUMBER.description: Signal account phone number in E.164 format (e.g., +1234567890)

SIGNAL_HTTP_URL.description: Signal CLI REST API URL (e.g., http://localhost:8080)

SIGNAL_CLI_PATH.description: Path to signal-cli executable (alternative to HTTP API)

SIGNAL_SHOULD_IGNORE_GROUP_MESSAGES.description: If true, the bot will only respond to direct messages

plugins.name: Simple Voice
plugins.description: Retro 1980s SAM Text-to-Speech plugin for ElizaOS agents

plugins.name: Slack
plugins.description: Slack integration plugin for ElizaOS agents with Socket Mode support

SLACK_BOT_TOKEN.description: Slack Bot Token (xoxb-...) for API authentication

SLACK_APP_TOKEN.description: Slack App Token (xapp-...) for Socket Mode connections

SLACK_SIGNING_SECRET.description: Slack Signing Secret for verifying requests

SLACK_USER_TOKEN.description: Optional User Token (xoxp-...) for enhanced permissions

SLACK_CHANNEL_IDS.description: Comma-separated list of channel IDs to restrict the bot to

SLACK_SHOULD_IGNORE_BOT_MESSAGES.description: If true, the bot will ignore messages from other bots

SLACK_SHOULD_RESPOND_ONLY_TO_MENTIONS.description: If true, the bot will only respond when mentioned

plugins.name: Social Alpha
plugins.description: Social Alpha Plugin  Tracks token recommendations (shills/FUD), builds trust scores based on P&L outcomes, and exposes a Social Alpha Provider with win rate, rank, and recommender analytics.

SOL_ADDRESS.description: The mint/contract address used to represent native SOL when interacting with token swap logic.

SOLANA_RPC_URL.description: The Solana RPC endpoint the application should connect to.

WALLET_SECRET_SALT.description: Salt used to derive or encrypt the Solana wallet's secret key; required if the direct secret key is not provided.

WALLET_SECRET_KEY.description: Base58-encoded Solana wallet secret (private) key; required if WALLET_SECRET_SALT is not supplied.

WALLET_PUBLIC_KEY.description: Base58-encoded Solana wallet public key corresponding to WALLET_SECRET_KEY.

SOLANA_PUBLIC_KEY.description: Alternative name accepted by runtime for the wallet's public key.

SLIPPAGE.description: Maximum acceptable slippage (likely as a percentage or basis points) for Solana swaps/transactions.

HELIUS_API_KEY.description: API key for accessing the Helius Solana infrastructure services.

BIRDEYE_API_KEY.description: API key for accessing Birdeye market data services.

SOLANA_PRIVATE_KEY.description: The Solana wallet private key in base58 or base64 format, used to create a Keypair when private key access is required.

WALLET_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Alternative variable name for the Solana wallet private key in base58 or base64.

plugins.name: Tee
plugins.description: Trusted Execution Environment (TEE) integration plugin for elizaOS - Multi-language support (TypeScript, Python, Rust)

TEE_MODE.description: Determines the Trusted Execution Environment operation mode (LOCAL, DOCKER, PRODUCTION) and is referenced in error handling to validate provided modes.

TEE_VENDOR.description: Specifies which Trusted Execution Environment vendor to initialize (defaults to PHALA).

WALLET_SECRET_SALT.description: Secret salt used to deterministically derive Solana and EVM keypairs inside the TEE.

TELEGRAM_API_ROOT.description: Base URL for Telegram Bot API used by the TelegramService, allowing override of the default API endpoint.

TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN.description: Telegram bot token used for authenticating and operating the Telegram bot.

TELEGRAM_ALLOWED_CHATS.description: JSON-encoded array of Telegram chat IDs that are authorized to interact with the bot.

TELEGRAM_TEST_CHAT_ID.description: Telegram chat ID used by the test suite to send, receive, and validate messages during Telegram bot tests.

plugins.name: Todo
plugins.description: Multi-language Todo list plugin for elizaOS with TypeScript, Python, and Rust implementations

REMINDER_INTERVAL_MS.description: Interval in milliseconds between reminder checks

plugins.name: Trajectory Logger
plugins.description: Trajectory logging plugin for ElizaOS - capture agent interaction trajectories for RL training

plugins.name: Trust
plugins.description: Trust and permission management plugin for ElizaOS

plugins.name: Tts
plugins.description: Text-to-speech coordinator for Eliza agents with multi-provider support

TTS_AUTO_MODE.description: When to automatically apply TTS (off, always, inbound, tagged)

TTS_DEFAULT_PROVIDER.description: Default TTS provider (auto, elevenlabs, openai, edge, simple-voice)

TTS_MAX_LENGTH.description: Maximum text length for TTS synthesis

TTS_SUMMARIZE.description: Summarize long text instead of truncating

plugins.name: Twilio
plugins.description: Twilio plugin for bidirectional voice and text messaging integration

AI_GATEWAY_API_KEY.description: API key for Vercel AI Gateway (OpenAI-compatible endpoints).

AIGATEWAY_API_KEY.description: Alternate env var for AI Gateway API key.

VERCEL_OIDC_TOKEN.description: OIDC token for Vercel (used as Bearer auth for Gateway).

AI_GATEWAY_BASE_URL.description: Base URL for AI Gateway OpenAI-compatible API.

AI_GATEWAY_SMALL_MODEL.description: Identifier of the small language model to be used.

AI_GATEWAY_LARGE_MODEL.description: Identifier of the large language model to be used.

AI_GATEWAY_EMBEDDING_MODEL.description: Identifier of the model to use for generating text embeddings.

AI_GATEWAY_EMBEDDING_DIMENSIONS.description: Number of dimensions for the returned embedding vectors.

AI_GATEWAY_IMAGE_MODEL.description: Identifier of the model used for image generation.

plugins.name: Vision
plugins.description: Vision plugin for ElizaOS - provides camera integration and visual awareness

CAMERA_NAME.description: Camera name to search for (lowercase partial match)

PIXEL_CHANGE_THRESHOLD.description: Percentage of pixels that must change to trigger VLM update (default: 50)

plugins.name: Webhooks
plugins.description: HTTP webhook ingress for external triggers (wake, agent, mapped hooks)

plugins.name: Whatsapp
plugins.description: WhatsApp Cloud API plugin for ElizaOS

plugins.name: X402
plugins.description: x402 HTTP payment protocol plugin for ElizaOS - send and receive crypto payments

XAI_API_KEY.description: xAI API key for Grok model access and X (formerly Twitter) integration.

XAI_MODEL.description: xAI Grok model for text generation (grok-3, grok-3-mini).

XAI_SMALL_MODEL.description: xAI Grok model for faster/smaller tasks.

X_AUTH_MODE.description: X (formerly Twitter) auth mode: 'env' (API keys), 'oauth' (OAuth2 PKCE), or 'bearer'.

X_API_KEY.description: X (formerly Twitter) API key for OAuth 1.0a.

X_API_SECRET.description: X (formerly Twitter) API secret key for OAuth 1.0a.

X_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: X (formerly Twitter) access token for OAuth 1.0a.

X_ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET.description: X (formerly Twitter) access token secret for OAuth 1.0a.

X_BEARER_TOKEN.description: X (formerly Twitter) Bearer token for app-only authentication.

X_DRY_RUN.description: When true, all X actions are simulated.

X_MAX_POST_LENGTH.description: Maximum post length (up to 4000 for premium).
